metadata.synopsis: Mizora final comment that she saved Ravengard and that she will bring him to the submersible.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Mizora appears and saves Ravengard if he dies in the Iron Throne and Wyll kept his pact.This plays when she appears to resurrect him.

0.speaker: Mizora
0.text: My my, what a mess. I'll get the duke to the submersible; you can take care of the clutter.
